info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:27PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Steuben County through 400 PM EDT... At 327 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sonora, or 15 miles northwest of Corning, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bath, Thurston, Savona, Kanona, Sonora, Cameron Mills, Risingville and North Cameron. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 36 and 40. Interstate 390 near 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
